titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I gave an address at the marriage of Mr Clutton. Peile 'tied the knot'. He lunched here first.
Tom Nicholson had some talk with me about his son, Herbert. I urged him to make no delay in apprenticing him to a trade, & promised to help in paying the premium.
